Other Ingredients: 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce (they use a lot)

notes: Leftovers freeze well. This makes at least 10 portions at 1x
recipe: Use the same pan to brown the hamburger meat and preheat the oven to 350
Combine everything into 1-10 large oven-safe dishes. Using a wooden spoon, squish the tomatoes, then stir everything together
Cook uncovered for at least 2 hours at 350 (for 4-5 hours, add additional water)
